source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_00<tab>Stephanivien seems in a cheerful mood.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_00<tab>スカイスチール機工房のステファニヴィアンは、冒険者に話したいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_01<tab>Stephanivien welcomes you back to the manufactory, but his cheerful mood is soon soured by the arrival of a Temple Knight. It would seem that the chief machinist has been accused of fomenting insurrection, and a failure to clear this suspicion may result in the seizure of the workshop and imprisonment for its employees. Speak with Stephanivien, and discuss this ominous development.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_01<tab>スカイスチール機工房と、ステファニヴィアンに内乱予備罪の嫌疑がかかり、工房封鎖の危機に見舞われた。スカイスチール機工房の「ステファニヴィアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_02<tab>Reasoning that an attempt to disprove his own actions would be fruitless, Stephanivien decides to counter the accusation by providing evidence of Tedalgrinche's wrongdoing. Head to the Forgotten Knight, and join Celestaux in his search for strings that would connect House Dzemael to their crimes.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_02<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話した。イシュガルドの下層で忘れられた騎士亭にいる「セレスト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_03<tab>Celestaux tells you of the sudden absence of Fraideoux─the man who stood guard over Joye's abducted father─and explains how his suspicions led him to investigate the novice machinist's abode. Amidst the splinters of broken furniture, it seems he discovered the ragged feather of a wild chocobo. Take the tale back to Stephanivien, and plan your next move.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_03<tab>セレストと話した。スカイスチール機工房の「ステファニヴィアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_04<tab>You relay Celestaux's discovery to Stephanivien, and he decides to follow the lead to the Dravanian forelands. Make your way to Tailfeather, and speak with the chief machinist once more.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_04<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話した。高地ドラヴァニアのテイルフェザーにいる「ステファニヴィアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_05<tab>You join Stephanivien and Joye in Tailfeather. The chief machinist has already questioned the local hunters, and learned that a man matching Fraideoux's description was seen in the company of a rough-looking trio. Head to your assigned search area to the north of the settlement, and confront any suspicious fellows you find.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_05<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話した。テイルフェザーの北にいる「怪しげな男」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_06<tab>You find your quarry in a secluded corner of the forest, but are attacked the instant you approach. The ruffians, however, are no match for your effortless marksmanship. Holster your firearm, and rescue Fraideoux from his bonds.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_06<tab>怪しげな男と話したところ、襲ってきたので、これを討伐した。テイルフェザーの北にいる「フレードゥー」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_07<tab>Stephanivien and Joye appear at the scene of the rescue, and Fraideoux begs forgiveness for his unwilling betrayal. The chief machinist waves away the apology, and instead seizes upon the opportunity to turn the tables on his accuser. Return to the Skysteel Manufactory and speak with Stephanivien.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_07<tab>フレードゥーを救助した。スカイスチール機工房の「ステファニヴィアン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_08You arrive back at the manufactory to find that Stephanivien has, with the aid of Fraideoux's testimony, lodged a counter-accusation against Tedalgrinche. Practice your new machinist technique whilst you wait for the wheels of justice to slowly grind the suspicions against the workshop into dust.

※The next machinist quest will be available from Stephanivien upon reaching level 58.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SEQ_08ステファニヴィアンと話した。ゼーメル家の悪事を立証することができた。工房の嫌疑が正式に晴れるまで、新たな銃術の腕を磨いておこう。

※機工士のレベルが58以上になると、スカイスチール機工房のステファニヴィアンから次の機工士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Stephanivien.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_00<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_01<tab>Meet Celestaux in the Forgotten Knight.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_01<tab>忘れられた騎士亭でセレストと話す

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Stephanivien.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_02<tab>スカイスチール機工房のステファニヴィアンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Stephanivien in Tailfeather.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_03<tab>テイルフェザーのステファニヴィアンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_04<tab>Confront the suspicious fellow north of Tailfeather.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_04<tab>怪しげな男と話す

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_05<tab>Rescue Fraideoux.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_05<tab>フレードゥーを救助する

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Stephanivien at the Skysteel Manufactory.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_TODO_06<tab>スカイスチール機工房のステファニヴィアンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_000<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Is this not a wonderful day to be a machinist?
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_000よく来てくれた、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
新しい銃術も、使いこなせているようだね。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_KISHI01708_000_001<tab>(-Stern Voice-)Lord Stephanivien de Haillenarte! You and the Skysteel Manufactory employees under your authority are hereby charged with fomenting insurrection!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_KISHI01708_000_001(-厳めしい声-)ステファニヴィアン卿は、おられるか！？
貴殿が管轄する「スカイスチール機工房」に、
内乱予備罪の嫌疑ありと告発が成された！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_002<tab>Insurrection!? My dear ser, I have fomented nothing of the sort!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_002内乱予備罪だって！？
待ってくれ……まったく身に覚えがないんだが？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_KISHI01708_000_003<tab>You stand accused of arming commoners with weapons of war, and discharging said weapons within the locality of the Brume.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_KISHI01708_000_003この工房に出入りする平民に武器を支給し、
雲霧街で発砲騒ぎを起こさせたという告発があったのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_004<tab>Ah... That little scene when we liberated Joye's father...
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_004<tab>ああ……ジョイの父上を連れ戻しに行った時か……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_KISHI01708_000_005<tab>Henceforth, the manufactory shall remain under Temple Knight surveillance─should you fail to refute the accusations against you within the allotted time, punishment may include seizure of your workshop...and imprisonment for all those deemed accomplices to the crime.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_KISHI01708_000_005これにより、しばしの間、工房を監視下に置くこととする。
期間中に疑いを晴らせぬようなら、工房の閉鎖……
および、関係者の投獄もあり得ると心得よ！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_006<tab>The Fury take that smirking fox! Tedalgrinche <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> we would attempt a rescue!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_006くっ、やられた……。
俺たちがジョイの父上を助け出すことすらも、
テダルグランシュの想定内だったということか！？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ROSTNSTHAL_000_007<tab>Once they set their sights on summat, them Temple Knights is like a bandersnatch with a bone. Ye'd best say farewell to yer workshop.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ROSTNSTHAL_000_007なるほど、その手で来たか……。
しかし、お上に目を付けられたとあっちゃ、お先は真っ暗だな。
このまま行けば、工房の閉鎖も時間の問題だろうよ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_008<tab>They'll not take my manufactory! I will think of something...
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_008<tab>そんなことさせない、対策を考える……！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ROSTNSTHAL_000_010<tab>Once they set their sights on summat, them Temple Knights is like a bandersnatch with a bone. Best say farewell to the workshop.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ROSTNSTHAL_000_010お上に目を付けられたとあっちゃ、お先は真っ暗だな。
このまま行けば、工房の閉鎖も時間の問題だろうよ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_JOYE_000_010<tab>How could they have twisted me dad's rescue into an act of insurrection!?
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_JOYE_000_010お言葉ですが……
雲霧街での発砲は、監禁された父を助け出すためのもの……。
それを理由に内乱予備罪だなんて、濡れ衣もいいところです！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_010<tab>That Tedalgrinche bastard's always two steps ahead...
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_010<tab>あの気取った貴族め、ここまで仕掛けていたとは……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_010<tab>'Tis difficult to prove the truth of something one has not done. Mayhap the wiser course would be to provide evidence of Tedalgrinche's wrongdoing.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_010いつの時代も、「やっていないことの証明」は難しい……。
むしろ、テダルグランシュ側の罪の証拠を提出して、
告発し返す方が上策だな。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ROSTNSTHAL_000_011<tab>'E's a clever bastard, though, that one. Ye might try─ Ah, but I'd best not overstep me bounds.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ROSTNSTHAL_000_011敵は狡猾だから、難しいだろう……。
おっと、指南役の契約を逸脱するから、俺は手伝わないぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ROSTNSTHAL_000_012<tab>Me contract's almost done in any case, and I'll be movin' on no matter what 'appens to the workshop.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ROSTNSTHAL_000_012その契約も、そろそろ終わる。
工房がどうなろうと、俺は次の場所に行くだけだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_013<tab>Our instructor, he sure don't like to get involved... As for me, I'll see if I can find any strings connectin' House Dzemael to their crimes. The Forgotten Knight should be a good place to start.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_013指南役は、相変わらずつれないですねぇ……。
あっしは、誘拐騒ぎとゼーメル家の繋がりを探ってみやす。
忘れられた騎士亭にいるんで、手伝いをよこしてください。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_JOYE_000_014<tab>I don't know what I'd do without the workshop! I'll see if I can't get some folks talkin'!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_JOYE_000_014工房がなくなってしまっては、困ります！
ジョイも聞き込みに行ってみます！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_015<tab>And that leaves you and me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I believe I shall remain here in the manufactory to occupy the gaze of the Temple Knights, whilst you aid Celestaux with his inquiries.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_015ジョイも、自発的に動いてくれるようになって頼もしいよ。
俺は工房に残って、監視の目を引きつけておこう。
すまないが、君はセレストを手伝ってくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_019<tab>'Tis difficult to prove the truth of something one has not done. Mayhap the wiser course would be to provide evidence of Tedalgrinche's wrongdoing.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_019いつの時代も、「やっていないことの証明」は難しい……。
むしろ、テダルグランシュ側の罪の証拠を提出して、
告発し返す方が上策だな。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_020<tab>I appreciate you comin' out, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It's a bit hard plannin' aught in the workshop, what with the Temple Knights eyeballin' our every move. We should be able to talk freely in here, though.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_020わざわざ出向いてもらって、すみやせん。
監視されてる工房じゃ、こっちの動きが敵に筒抜け……。
ここなら平民が多いし、何かと動きやすいんでさぁ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_021<tab>Do you recall that bloke as was standin' guard over Joye's dad? Aye, “Fraideoux” is his name. He took to marksmanship with a passion, and hadn't missed a single day of trainin'...not until today.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_021ジョイの父を監禁していた男を覚えてやすか？
フレードゥーという名なんですが、工房に入って以来、
熱心に銃術を学んでいたものの、数日前から姿を消してます……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_022<tab>I got suspicious, of course, and decided to pay a visit to his home. Right away, you could see the door had been kicked in, so I went inside and had me a proper look. That's when I found a ragged feather just lyin' there on the floor amidst the bits of broken furniture.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_022ヤツの棲家を訪れたところ、賊に襲われた形跡がありやした。
手がかりは、不自然に落ちていたチョコボの羽根だけ……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_023<tab>If I wanted to keep me hands clean, then maybe I'd hire me some thugs from out of town to do for poor Fraideoux. Thugs what might otherwise make a livin' poachin' wild chocobos.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_023あっしの見立てじゃ、この羽根は野生のチョコボのものです。
足が付くことを嫌い、都市外の荒くれ者を雇って、
フレードゥーを襲わせた可能性がありやす。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_024<tab>I suggest you talk to Lord Stephanivien, and take a trip out to Tailfeather. I'll keep pokin' around here in the city and see what else crawls out of the stonework.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_CELESTAUX_000_024……すると、賊はテイルフェザーから来た連中かもしれやせん。
工房長に話して、調査を進めてみてください。
あっしは、都市内での調査を続けます。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_030<tab>...Hmmm, this may be our best lead. If we can track down the man who first employed Fraideoux, then we shall have a solid link to House Dzemael.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_030……なるほど、事情はわかった。
フレードゥーに金を掴ませたヤツを辿れば、
ゼーメル家の関与を証明できるかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_031<tab>Let us waste no time. Onwards to the Dravanian forelands, and to Tailfeather!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_031では、俺たちも、さっそく調べに行くとするか。
高地ドラヴァニアの「テイルフェザー」で落ち合おう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_039<tab>Onwards to the Dravanian forelands, and to Tailfeather!
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_039<tab>高地ドラヴァニアの「テイルフェザー」で落ち合おう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_040<tab>Good news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I have spoken with some few of these hunter fellows, and they told me of a trio of ruffians that passed through here dragging a man matching Fraideoux's description.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_040来たか、)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
さっそく猟師たちに話を聞いてみたんだが、
どうやら、フレードゥーらしき男を連れた一団がいるらしい。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_041<tab>We shall scour the forest to the south, if you will look to the north. Do not wait for us─should you find these ruffians, then pray confront them ere Fraideoux comes to further harm.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_041俺たちは、南の方を探してみる。
君は、北の方を調べてくれるか？
怪しい者がいたら、声をかけてみるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ZOKU01708_000_041<tab>No witnesses! Cut this one's throat as well!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_ZOKU01708_000_041ちっ……貴様、見たな！？
野郎ども、こいつをやっちまえ！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_049<tab>H-How did you find me!?
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_049<tab>なぜ、あなたがここに……！？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_050<tab>...My thanks. I did not expect to see another dawn.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_050ああ……助かりました……。
一度ならず二度までも、ありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_051<tab>Fraideoux! Not leaking blood, are you? Splendid! You gave us quite a scare!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_051フレードゥー、無事だったか？
行方知れずになったと聞いて、驚いたぞ。
……いったい、何があったんだ？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_052<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_052<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_053<tab>F-Forgive me, me lord! Those men...they dragged me from me home. Said they'd hurt me if I didn't swear false witness to the Temple Knights...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_053工房長……すみません！
ねぐらに戻ったところを、連中に襲われまして……
脅されて、神殿騎士様の前で偽証しちまいました……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_054<tab>You were forced to substantiate their accusations? Then you merely need withdraw your testimony to strengthen our position. 'Twould be a boon if we were also able to provide some manner of physical evidence...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_054告発に協力するよう強要されたんだな？
脅されたのなら仕方ない、証言を訂正してくれればいいさ。
それよりも、ゼーメル家との繋がりを示す証拠はないか？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_055<tab>A seal of House Dzemael. 'Twould explain how the ruffians who snatched Fraideoux were able to enter the city without challenge. Aye, this shall do nicely.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_055これは「」か……。
フレードゥーを襲った連中が持っていたとなると、
これを使って皇都に出入りしていれば、有力な証拠になる。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_056<tab>I'm truly sorry, me lord. All it took was one little beating for me to repay your kindness with betrayal. I'll not darken your doorstep again...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_056工房長、本当にすみません……。
脅されていたとはいえ、俺は恩を仇で返しちまいました……。
……もう工房には戻れねぇ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_057<tab>What nonsense! You hardly had a choice in the matter!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_057フレードゥー、気にするな。
俺としては、工房に戻ってきてくれた方が、数倍助かるよ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_058<tab>Continue your training at the manufactory, however, and you'll become more than a match for thugs such as these. Even without a noble's wealth or prestige, a common man can earn himself independence!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_058貴族のような財や権力を持たずとも、
「機工士」としての技術を学ぶことで、自立できる……。
俺は、工房をそんな場所にしていきたいのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_JOYE_000_059<tab>You'll see that a machinist's firearm is for more than just shootin' dragons─it can help set you free. His lordship's vision'll change Ishgard for the better!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_JOYE_000_059「機工士」の銃は、竜だけじゃなくて、
自由を縛る枷をも撃ち抜けるんですよ。
ジョイにできたんですから、フレードゥーさんもできます！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_JOYE_000_060<tab>Come with us, Fraideoux! Become the spear and the shield that our city needs!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_JOYE_000_060いっしょに、『竜を討つ槍となり、皇都を護る盾となる』……
そんな「機工士」を目指しましょう……！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_061<tab><sob> I-I'd like that... I'd like to feel like I'm worth somethin'...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_FRAIDEOUX_000_061うう……みんな、ありがてぇ……。
今度こそ、がんばり抜いてみせます……！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_062<tab>We all make mistakes, my dear fellow. The trick is to learn from them, and rise stronger from every defeat! Come, let us return to the manufactory!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_062間違えるのは、仕方ない。
その経験を糧に、うまくいくまで、何度でもやり直せばいい。
さあ、工房へ帰ろう！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_070<tab>The tables have turned, my friend. I have submitted the evidence you found to the Temple Knights.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_070)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
今回も協力してくれて、ありがとう。
集まった証拠は、まとめて神殿騎士団に提出しておいたよ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_071<tab>With the aid of Fraideoux's new testimony, we had enough proof to lodge a counter-accusation against Tedalgrinche.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_071フレードゥーも証言を訂正してくれたおかげで、
神殿騎士団に、テダルグランシュの悪事も立証できた。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_072<tab>The wheels of justice have begun to turn, and we shall soon be free of these baseless suspicions!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_072俺たちの嫌疑を取り下げる手続きも始まったようだから、
嫌疑は、いずれ完全に晴れるだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_073<tab>In the meantime, Rostnsthal requested that I instruct you to “remember yer bleedin' practice drills!” Charming fellow.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_STEPHANIVIEN_000_073それまでは、さらなる鍛練に励むようにって、
指南役から、君への伝言を頼まれたよ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SYTEM_000_074<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_JOBMCH560_01708_SYTEM_000_074<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
